title: SettledEntityMatrixSourceEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the relevant settled entity matrix source.

oneOf.title: ConfirmationAnnex
oneOf.description: The Relevant Settled Entity Matrix shall be the list agreed for this purpose by the parties. The list is not included as part of the electronic confirmation.

oneOf.title: Publisher
oneOf.description: The Settled Entity Matrix published by the Index Publisher.
